meanings.definition: To chew or bite on something repeatedly.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit was chawing on a carrot.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys chawing gum while studying.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was chawing on the shoelaces, thinking they were a tasty snack.
meanings.sent4: The old man sat on the porch, chawing on memories of his youth.
meanings.sent5: The woodpecker could be heard chawing on the tree trunk in the quiet forest.

meanings.definition: The act of chewing or gnawing on something.
meanings.sent1: The loud chawing of the dog on his bone filled the room.
meanings.sent2: The chawing sound of the squirrel on the nut was unmistakable.
meanings.sent3: The chawing of the beaver on the log echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent4: The constant chawing of the mouse on the wire could be heard in the walls.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic chawing of the cow cud was a calming sound on the farm.
